rooms.description: Open space with wheelchair ramp entrance and reception area.
Spacious living area integrated with open-plan kitchen; designed for social gatherings.
Fully integrated kitchen adjoining the living room, complete with modern amenities and wheelchair accessible design.
Separate dining area within open-plan living space, allowing for seamless transition between kitchen and dining spaces.
Guest bedroom with adjacent balcony; designed to include wheelchair accessibility and ample natural light.
Service area including storage, laundry facilities, and additional utility rooms with Vastu considerations for energy flow.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with proper ramp access from the ground floor.
Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light and enhancing Mediterranean aesthetic.
